title: Monday Post Show (08-22-22)
itunes:title: Monday Post Show (08-22-22)
description:
Bobby on why we haven’t had a post-show in a week.  We each recap our weekend in 60 seconds. Amy on if her sister feels her life has changed since having a TV show. Lunchbox and Eddie had a weekend with the family. Bobby did some wake surfing and went to a furniture store. Bobby talks about hosting the Opry on Saturday night and how committed Carrie Underwood is to the Opry. Bobby also spent some time with Trace Adkins and joked around with him. We also got to some assorted news that we didn’t get to today during the radio show.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
